short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Allows comScore subscribers to get a quick overview of a site's digital audience size, rank, demographics, and engagement.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows comScore Media Metrix Multi-Platform subscribers to get a quick overview of a site's digital audience size, rank, demographics, and engagement without needing to open the full MyMetrix interface.
